plugin.comment: Ripped from the executable: 0 - projectile_impact 1 - projectile_detonation 2 - unused 3 - unused 4 - weapon_fire 5 - weapon_ready 6 - weapon_reload 7 - weapon_empty 8 - weapon_charge 9 - weapon_overheat 10 - weapon_idle 11 - unused 12 - unused 13 - object_impacts 14 - particle_impacts 15 - slow_particle_impacts 16 - unused 17 - unused 18 - unit_footsteps 19 - unit_dialog 20 - unused 21 - unused 22 - vehicle_collision 23 - vehicle_engine 24 - unused 25 - unused 26 - device_door 27 - device_force_field 28 - device_machinery 29 - device_nature 30 - device_computers 31 - unused 32 - music 33 - ambient_nature 34 - ambient_machinery 35 - ambient_computers 36 - unused 37 - unused 38 - unused 39 - first_person_damage 40 - unused 41 - unused 42 - unused 43 - unused 44 - scripted_dialog_player 45 - scripted_effect 46 - scripted_dialog_other 47 - scripted_dialog_force_unspatialized 48 - unused 49 - unused 50 - game_event

int16.name: Maximum Sounds Per Tag
int16.tooltip: [1,16] maximum number of sounds playing per individual sound tag

int16.name: Maximum Sounds Per Object
int16.tooltip: [1,16] maximum number of sounds per individual sound tag playing on an object

int32.name: Preemption Time
int32.tooltip: replaces other instances after this many milliseconds

float32.name: Reverb Gain
float32.tooltip: how much reverb applies to this sound class

float32.name: Cutscene Ducking Sustain Time
float32.tooltip: how long this lasts after the cutscene ends

float32.name: Scripted Dialog Ducking Fade In Time
Scripted Dialog Ducking Sustain Time
float32.tooltip: how long this lasts after the scripted dialog ends

float32.name: Scripted Dialog Ducking Fade Out Time
